entry.title: vietnamese bananna cake
entry.content:
Like many deserts from Asia, this is somewhat gelatinous. Still it’s excellent.

Ingredients

  • 4 bananas
  • 2/3 cup sugar
  • 1 can coconut milk
  • 6 oz french baguette (about 5-8”)
  • 5.5 tbsp cornstarch
  • 2-3 limes

Steps

  1. Preheat oven to 400◦ F
  2. Slice bananas on a slight diagonal. Place in bowl and sprinkle with sugar till all slices are covered & let sit for 10-15 min
  3. Break bread into small pieces, add coconut milk and 2/3 cup (or less to taste) sugar
  4. Stir till bread is soft, add cornstarch
  5. Cover bottom of cake mold w/ parchment paper
  6. Fill mold w/ bread+sugar+ coconut mixture
  7. Cover top with bananas – discard excess sugar/banana water
  8. Bake for 1 hour
  9. Serve chilled – squeeze lime juice onto cake before eating
